title: After Everything
short_cast: Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Josephine Langford, Mimi Keene, Stephen Moyer, Louise Lombard, Arielle Kebbel, Carter Jenkins, Rob Estes, Frances Turner, Benjamin Mascolo, Chance Perdomo, Kiana Madeira
cast: Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Josephine Langford, Mimi Keene, Stephen Moyer, Louise Lombard, Arielle Kebbel, Carter Jenkins, Rob Estes, Frances Turner, Benjamin Mascolo, Chance Perdomo, Kiana Madeira

desc: Heartbroken and suffering from writer's block, Hardin heads to Lisbon to make amends with his past so he can focus on building a future with Tessa.
